ygData.subject: Re: Meeting the big bot
ygData.msgSnippet: Motormaster turns to Dead-End with an amused look on his face. Of course there s no point to the race, they re just doing it for pure fun. We ve been in cells

Subject: Re: Meeting the big bot
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

Motormaster turns to Dead-End with an amused look on his face. "Of course
there's no point to the race, they're just doing it for pure fun. We've
been in cells for so many I can't blame them" With that Motormaster
Transforms to his huge semi truck form. "In fact, its been too long since
i've felt something grind under my wheel. You two stay here and guard the
base, and Dead-End, try to have some Fun when i'm gone." With that the
sound of his motor becomes evident as the huge monster of metal comes to
life and speeds up towards a forest in the distance. Walking out of the
ship Speedbreaker turns to Dead-End "well looks like it's just you and me
buddy."



Further down the sandy beach the two cars speed thouroughly with Wildrider
swerving into and out of the water and then comes to a sudden stop as he
crashes into a hude boulder on the coast. "Ha ha ha. Ohhh that felt great
he stammers as he starts to pull back in reverse"
